# Requirements Quality Checklist: Chat Dialog Interface

**Purpose**: Validate specification completeness, clarity, consistency, and measurability for the chat dialog interface feature
**Created**: 2025-01-27
**Feature**: [spec.md](../spec.md)

**Note**: This checklist is generated by the `/speckit.checklist` command based on feature context and requirements.

## Requirement Completeness

- [ ] CHK001 - Are all functional requirements for message input interface explicitly specified? [Completeness, Spec §FR-1]
- [ ] CHK002 - Are all functional requirements for send functionality clearly documented? [Completeness, Spec §FR-2]
- [ ] CHK003 - Are all functional requirements for message display behavior specified? [Completeness, Spec §FR-3]
- [ ] CHK004 - Are all functional requirements for message alignment explicitly defined? [Completeness, Spec §FR-4]
- [ ] CHK005 - Are all functional requirements for message list scrolling documented? [Completeness, Spec §FR-5]
- [ ] CHK006 - Are requirements defined for empty state scenarios (no messages)? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK007 - Are requirements specified for maximum message length or input validation? [Gap]
- [ ] CHK008 - Are requirements defined for what happens when input field is empty and send is clicked? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK009 - Are requirements specified for message text wrapping behavior (long messages)? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK010 - Are requirements defined for keyboard dismissal behavior? [Gap]

## Requirement Clarity

- [ ] CHK011 - Is "at the bottom of the screen" quantified with specific positioning requirements? [Clarity, Spec §FR-1]
- [ ] CHK012 - Is "adjacent to the input field" defined with specific layout/spacing requirements? [Clarity, Spec §FR-2]
- [ ] CHK013 - Is "immediately after sending" quantified with specific timing requirements? [Clarity, Spec §FR-3]
- [ ] CHK014 - Is "visually distinct and consistent" defined with measurable visual properties? [Clarity, Spec §FR-4]
- [ ] CHK015 - Is "exceeds the visible area" quantified with specific threshold (number of messages or screen height)? [Clarity, Spec §FR-5]
- [ ] CHK016 - Is "instantaneous" quantified with specific timing thresholds? [Clarity, Spec §NFR-1]
- [ ] CHK017 - Is "no noticeable delay" defined with measurable timing criteria? [Clarity, Spec §NFR-1]
- [ ] CHK018 - Is "easily accessible" defined with specific accessibility criteria? [Clarity, Spec §NFR-2]
- [ ] CHK019 - Is "clearly visible" quantified with specific visual properties (size, contrast, position)? [Clarity, Spec §NFR-2]
- [ ] CHK020 - Is "easily tappable" defined with specific touch target size requirements? [Clarity, Spec §NFR-2]
- [ ] CHK021 - Is "visually clear" quantified with measurable visual distinction criteria? [Clarity, Spec §NFR-2]
- [ ] CHK022 - Is "sufficient contrast" quantified with specific contrast ratio requirements? [Clarity, Spec §NFR-3]

## Requirement Consistency

- [ ] CHK023 - Are message alignment requirements consistent between functional requirements and user stories? [Consistency, Spec §FR-4 vs §User Stories]
- [ ] CHK024 - Do performance requirements align with user experience requirements? [Consistency, Spec §NFR-1 vs §NFR-2]
- [ ] CHK025 - Are accessibility requirements consistent across all interactive elements? [Consistency, Spec §NFR-3]
- [ ] CHK026 - Do acceptance criteria align with functional requirements? [Consistency, Spec §Acceptance Criteria vs §Requirements]
- [ ] CHK027 - Are success criteria measurable and aligned with functional requirements? [Consistency, Spec §Success Criteria vs §Requirements]

## Acceptance Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK028 - Are all acceptance criteria testable and unambiguous? [Measurability, Spec §Acceptance Criteria]
- [ ] CHK029 - Can "user can see" be objectively verified without subjective interpretation? [Measurability, Spec §AC-1, AC-3]
- [ ] CHK030 - Can "immediately visible" be objectively measured? [Measurability, Spec §AC-10]
- [ ] CHK031 - Are acceptance criteria specific enough to determine pass/fail status? [Clarity, Spec §Acceptance Criteria]
- [ ] CHK032 - Do acceptance criteria cover all functional requirements? [Coverage, Spec §Acceptance Criteria vs §Requirements]

## Success Criteria Quality

- [ ] CHK033 - Are success criteria quantified with specific, measurable metrics? [Measurability, Spec §Success Criteria]
- [ ] CHK034 - Can "100% of users" be objectively verified? [Measurability, Spec §Success Criteria-1]
- [ ] CHK035 - Is "within 2 seconds" a measurable and testable criterion? [Measurability, Spec §Success Criteria-2]
- [ ] CHK036 - Can "no perceived delay" be objectively measured? [Measurability, Spec §Success Criteria-2]
- [ ] CHK037 - Is "immediately apparent to 95% of users" a testable criterion? [Measurability, Spec §Success Criteria-2]
- [ ] CHK038 - Are success criteria technology-agnostic (no implementation details)? [Clarity, Spec §Success Criteria]
- [ ] CHK039 - Do success criteria align with functional and non-functional requirements? [Consistency, Spec §Success Criteria]

## Scenario Coverage

- [ ] CHK040 - Are requirements defined for the primary flow (user sends message)? [Coverage, Spec §FR-2, FR-3]
- [ ] CHK041 - Are requirements defined for alternate flows (other party sends message)? [Coverage, Spec §FR-3, FR-4]
- [ ] CHK042 - Are error/exception scenarios addressed (e.g., empty input, network failure)? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK043 - Are recovery scenarios defined (e.g., message send failure, retry behavior)? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK044 - Are requirements specified for initial state (empty conversation)? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK045 - Are requirements defined for state transitions (empty → messages → more messages)? [Coverage, Spec §Assumptions]

## Edge Case Coverage

- [ ] CHK046 - Are requirements defined for very long messages (text wrapping, truncation)? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK047 - Are requirements specified for rapid message sending (multiple messages quickly)? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK048 - Are requirements defined for messages with special characters or emoji? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK049 - Are requirements specified for different screen sizes and orientations? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK050 - Are requirements defined for keyboard behavior on different platforms (iOS vs Android)? [Edge Case, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK051 - Are requirements specified for what happens when message list becomes very long? [Edge Case, Gap]
- [ ] CHK052 - Are requirements defined for input field behavior with very long text? [Edge Case, Gap]

## Non-Functional Requirements Coverage

- [ ] CHK053 - Are performance requirements complete and measurable? [Completeness, Spec §NFR-1]
- [ ] CHK054 - Are user experience requirements specific and testable? [Completeness, Spec §NFR-2]
- [ ] CHK055 - Are accessibility requirements comprehensive for all interactive elements? [Completeness, Spec §NFR-3]
- [ ] CHK056 - Are performance requirements defined for different device capabilities? [Coverage, Gap]
- [ ] CHK057 - Are accessibility requirements aligned with platform standards (WCAG, etc.)? [Consistency, Gap]
- [ ] CHK058 - Are requirements specified for memory usage with large message lists? [Coverage, Gap]

## Dependencies & Assumptions

- [ ] CHK059 - Are all assumptions explicitly documented and validated? [Completeness, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK060 - Is the assumption about user identification mechanism validated? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK061 - Is the assumption about "other party" message source validated? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]
- [ ] CHK062 - Are dependencies on external systems or APIs documented? [Completeness, Spec §Technical Constraints]
- [ ] CHK063 - Are platform-specific assumptions (iOS/Android keyboard behavior) validated? [Assumption, Spec §Assumptions]

## Technical Constraints Clarity

- [ ] CHK064 - Are technical constraints specific enough to guide implementation? [Clarity, Spec §Technical Constraints]
- [ ] CHK065 - Are constraints consistent with constitutional principles? [Consistency, Spec §Technical Constraints vs §Constitution Check]
- [ ] CHK066 - Are constraints complete (all required technologies specified)? [Completeness, Spec §Technical Constraints]

## Scope Boundaries

- [ ] CHK067 - Are excluded features clearly documented with rationale? [Completeness, Spec §Scope-Excluded]
- [ ] CHK068 - Are scope boundaries unambiguous (no overlap between included/excluded)? [Clarity, Spec §Scope]
- [ ] CHK069 - Are future extensibility points identified (even if out of scope)? [Coverage, Gap]

## Ambiguities & Conflicts

- [ ] CHK070 - Are there any conflicting requirements between sections? [Conflict Check]
- [ ] CHK071 - Are vague terms ("prominent", "easily", "clearly") quantified or clarified? [Ambiguity Check]
- [ ] CHK072 - Are implementation details properly separated from requirements? [Clarity, Spec §Implementation Notes]

## Traceability

- [ ] CHK073 - Can all acceptance criteria be traced back to functional requirements? [Traceability, Spec §Acceptance Criteria]
- [ ] CHK074 - Can all success criteria be traced back to requirements? [Traceability, Spec §Success Criteria]
- [ ] CHK075 - Are user stories traceable to functional requirements? [Traceability, Spec §User Stories vs §Requirements]

## Notes

- Check items off as completed: `[x]`
- Add comments or findings inline
- Link to relevant resources or documentation
- Items are numbered sequentially for easy reference
- Items marked with [Gap] indicate potential missing requirements
- Items marked with [Ambiguity] indicate terms needing clarification
- Items marked with [Conflict] indicate potential requirement conflicts
- Items marked with [Assumption] indicate assumptions needing validation
